item.title: Massachusetts Forest Cover
item.description: Forest Cover Change in Massachusetts for 2015

item.title: Mexico Land Change
item.description: Land Cover Transition Potentials in Mexico for 2030 This project created maps of the lands potential to transtion from Forest, Grassland, and Shrubland to Agrigriculre or Settlement. We used ESA CCI Land Cover Data, reclassified into 7 catagories, and TerrSett’s Land Change Modeler tool. Land Cover in 2015 2030 Transition Potential Predicted 2030 Land Cover
